generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wet asphalt road with lane markings, extending into the distance, which fits the definition of a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the image, adjacent to the road, with a curb separating it from the road.

- vegetation: Numerous trees and green foliage are visible along the sides of the road and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing partly cloudy.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and in the background, including a white van on the right side of the image.
- truck: A white box truck is visible in the middle of the road, moving away from the camera.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow indicating a left turn is visible in the middle distance.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs along the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the left side of the image, above the road.
